rationale: Next.js App Router combines file-based routing, shared layouts, and Server Actions so the UI, data mutations, and SEO-friendly pages stay cohesive without extra wiring.
Tailwind centralizes design tokens and utilities for fast responsive layouts, keeping styles consistent without heavy custom CSS.
Shadcn/UI wraps Radix primitives with accessible defaults, speeding up production-ready prototyping with composable components.
Expo supports cross-platform development from one codebase with integrated tooling, OTA updates, and easy device testing.
Nativewind brings Tailwind-style utilities to React Native to keep styling consistent between web and mobile.
MMKV is a high-performance key-value store for caching user sessions and tokens on device.
NestJS provides a modular, testable API structure, while Zod enforces type-safe validation across request and response contracts.
MySQL delivers reliable OLTP storage, and Drizzle ORM offers a lightweight, type-safe query layer.
React Query manages server-state caching and synchronization, while Zustand keeps local UI state minimal and predictable.
